data.title: National Christian Foundation - Christian Giving
data.meta_description: Founded by generosity pioneers Larry Burkett, Ron Blue, and Terry Parker, NCF is now the 8th-largest U.S. non-profit and the largest Christian grantmaker in the world.
data.text:
A well-planned, intentional strategy for your giving can make all the difference. At NCF, our heart is to help generous people like you create a Giving Strategy based on biblical principles that empowers you to be more faithful, generous, and fully alive. If you want to give with more impact, cultivate unity in your family, and leave a legacy of generosity, letâ€™s start a conversation.

With an in-house team of expert attorneys, CPAs, and charitable professionals, we've received more than 3,000 complex gifts such as business interests and real estate.
